title: Ayurveda Hair Oil
description: Our hair oil helps to balance hormones. Allows for a reduction in hair loss, slows greying, banishes dandruff, soothes irritated scalp & most importantly, increases hair growth. Ingredients: Argan and grapeseed oil infused with ayuveda herbs: fenugreek, amla, ashwaganda and neem, rosemary, sage & vitamin e. H
